channel.title: Lab Code Challenge on CogSci to DatSci

item.title: Converting from wide to long format & ANOVA in R
item.description: Introduction In this post, I will discuss about how to convert data from wide format to long format; how to create a 2D figure with information from 3 variables; and how to conduct ANOVA in 3 different ways. The data in today’s example was collected by our lab (led by Dr. Paul Minda) for the purpose of predicting category-learning on two types of categories (i.e.,RD: Rule-defined, and II: Information Integration). Columns from B to AY are all predictive variables.
